page.description: Reads a file to an in-memory blob variable.
page.prototype: Data as B = FILE.TO_BLOB(Filename as C)

argument.name: Filename
argument.description: The full path specification of the file.

return.name: Data
return.description: Returns the binary data from the file.

page.discussion: The FILE.TO_BLOB() method reads a binary file from disk into a blob variable.
